When would be the latest I can get back to you on this?ÿÿKind regardsAdamÿÿGraftinGardeners Ltd ÿÿTerms, conditions, cancellation & complaints procedures can be found by clicking this link:ÿAll quotations are subject to our standard T&C's unless otherwise agreed.ÿÿÿFor more information on COVID-19 please click here to view our policyÿÿhttps://cas5-0-urlprotect.trendmicro.com:443/wis/clicktime/v1/query?url=www.graftingardeners.co.uk&umid=bd9d8657-6959-4c69-85a1-3d78e6c26cd3&auth=f23bd3b3794c7a5914053bd0a99b1b4837b89b14-ccf42c870fb86bae0c366ea10c0329010a4f12b6ÿÿÿÿTel: 0208 123 7653ÿCorrespondence address: 45 Swanwick Close, London SW15 4ESRegistered in UK No. 6822826Registered address:ÿCawley Place,ÿ15 Cawley Road.ÿChichester,ÿWest Sussex,ÿPO19 1UZÿÿCompany Registration Number: 06955635 - VAT Registration Number:ÿÿ182ÿ552ÿ893ÿÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿ ÿÿÿTo opt out of marketing emails please click here to unsubscribeFrom: Fuller, Stephen : RBKC <StephenJ.Fuller@rbkc.gov.uk>Sent: 19 April 2022 13:37To: Graftingardeners Ltd <info@graftingardeners.co.uk>Cc: alfred.dunston@minibuza.nl <alfred.dunston@minibuza.nl>Subject: s.211 Notification. Ref: ARB/22/02076. 38 Hyde Park Gate, SW7. ÿDear Mr ArnoldÿThe proposed tree works within the above application have now been considered. We are of the opinion that the works are unnecessary and would be detrimental to the amenity value of the trees.ÿTherefore, we would like you to either revise the above s.211 notification or withdraw it completely. If you decide to revise the s.211 we would raise no objection to the following works:ÿLondon plane - Crown thin by 20% and cut back from building to provide 4 metres clearance.Horse chestnut - Remove epicormic growth to crown break and cut back from street lamp to provide 2 metres clearance.ÿPlease respond to us by 25 April 2022 confirming your preferred course of action. If we have not heard from you by this date or you decide not to withdraw or revise this s.211notification, we will include the trees in a Tree Preservation Order.ÿWe look forward to hearing from you.ÿKind regardsÿStephen Fuller Senior Arboricultural Officer Planning and Place, Development ManagementRoyal Borough of Kensington and ChelseaÿTel: 07739 313732ÿÿTown Hall, Hornton Street, London, W8 ÿwww.rbkc.gov.ukÿ
